item.title: KDP
item.description: score:339 Chances: Keurig Dr Pepper (KDP) is on a growth track with strong brand strength and innovation efforts. Resilient category trends, market share gains, and significant pricing actions are contributing to KDP’s growth. The company’s product portfolio runs broad across the beverage space with brands like Dr Pepper, Snapple, and Keurig K-Cup coffee pods.
